text: Karol Drzewiecki (; born 1 November 1995) is a Polish tennis player. Drzewiecki has a career high ATP singles ranking of 902 achieved on 1 February 2016. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 252 achieved on 17 September 2018. Drzewiecki has won 1 ATP Challenger doubles title at the 2018 Pekao Szczecin Open. ==Tour titles== {| class=wikitable !
